levels.levelDescription: In the Luminous Shadowlands, the ethereal light dances upon the soft glow of the light-dirt paths. Beware of the shimmering waters that flow mysteriously, concealing hidden dangers beneath their surface.

Traverse through the Whispering Twilight Grove, where the pink-sand glistens under the fading light. Be cautious of the deep-dark holes scattered amidst the grove, whispering secrets of the ancient past.

Enter the Ethereal Void Sanctum, a realm of fractured-wall platforms floating amidst rivers of molten lava. Here, the malevolent Ethereal Void Stalker, the Phantom Wraith of legendary power, awaits, surrounded by the fiery embrace of the treacherous lava.
